name: Juan Ruiz
university: The University of Texas at San Antonio
summary: Senior Full Stack Python Developer with 7+ years of experience designing, developing, and deploying web applications and AI-powered solutions in retail, insurance, logistics, and enterprise systems. Proficient in Python (FastAPI, Django, Flask), React.js, Next.js, Node.js, and integrating LLMs, NLP models, and AI pipelines for automation and predictive analytics. Skilled in RESTful and GraphQL API design, microservices architecture, database design (PostgreSQL, MongoDB), and cloud deployments (AWS, Azure). Strong expertise in unit and integration testing (Jest, PyTest, Supertest), performance optimization, CI/CD, and DevOps practices. Experienced in Agile environments, collaborating with cross-functional teams to deliver scalable, maintainable, and high-performance applications.
